about.personalInfo: I am a front-end developer using React JS. I have a real passion in this field, so I work hard to give my best and at the same time I want to increase my experience. I'm a self-learned, organized, hardworking person.
about.EducationInfo: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology Engineering
